definition: to turn/to twist/to wring/to sprain/to swing one's hips

sentences.english: When measuring the lower torque, replace to with a liny spring.
sentences.chinese: 当测量小扭力时，用细弹簧替换粗弹簧。

sentences.english: I was very pleased with the torsional rigidity of the midsole .
sentences.chinese: 使我高兴的是其中底是有扭力的坚硬。

sentences.english: Your steering-head bearings should be in good shape and properly torqued .
sentences.chinese: 把头轴承工作正常并且有适当的扭力。

sentences.english: For almost 70 years Norbar has made torque wrenches at its factory at Banbury in the United Kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 诺霸设计和生产扭力工具已有70年的时间了。

sentences.english: Frame plate torsion balance is a measurement instrument by modifying the general frame-pan balance scale.
sentences.chinese: 架盘扭力天平是由普通架盘天平改型的衡量仪器。

sentences.english: Formed under the force of contortion, the gas field takes a S configuration.
sentences.chinese: 中坝气田在扭力的作用下，外形呈S形。

sentences.english: As iong as the pump turns faster than the turbine the torque is increased.
sentences.chinese: 只要是驱动叶轮转得比被动叶轮快扭力就增加。

sentences.english: An increase of anti-torque strength Vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 增加了整车抗扭力强度。

sentences.english: He used a very sensitive torsion balance.
sentences.chinese: 他利用了一架非常灵敏的扭力天平。

sentences.english: They too can be subject to both shear and bucking action and in isolated cases to torsion.
sentences.chinese: 他们能也是依于剪和压曲的行动和在例外情况对扭力。

definition: angular velocity/number of revolutions per minute
power output (of an electrical device etc)
